## ParticleMaterial.alphaMap property

Texture used to modulate particle alpha coverage (shape/softness). When set, enables the alpha map feature and marks uniforms dirty.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get alphaMap(): Texture2D;

set alphaMap(tex: Texture2D);
```
